NK103(pe)008:1: // b+h+au mi ma rga s+ya d+h+aa tu ti sma ///
NK103(pe)008:4: sarba d+harmab+ho d+hi tsit+tatat+t+waya hi nab+h+au mi m+aargash+aastrana ma /
NK103(pe)008:6: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gnas lugs byang chub
NK103(pe)008:7: kyi semslhun grub gsum de kho na nyid ma nor
NK103(pe)008:8: bas rang gi ngo bos nges pa'ignas shing rten pas
NK103(pe)008:9: sa'jug cing bgrod pas lam bstan pa zhes bya ba
NK103(pe)008:10: / bcom rang bzhin ldan rnam pa 'das mtshan nyid
NK103(pe)008:11: lhun grub gsum rang la gnas pas dpal de las
NK103(pe)008:12: gzhan pa'i spang bya med pas kun tu bzang po
NK103(pe)008:13: sbyang bgrod kyi rtsol ba dang bral ba gzhi ji
NK103(pe)008:14: bzhin pa'i ngang la ye nas dbyer med du mjal
NK103(pe)008:16: gnas lugs rang bzhin spros bral nyid du rnam pa
NK103(pe)008:17: sgyu ma mtshan nyid rang rig thams cad mkhyen par
NK103(pe)008:18: ye nas rdzogs pas lhun grub yin pa las /
NK103(pe)008:19: 'khrul tshul de rtogs pa'i rkyen bzhi dang bral zhing
NK103(pe)008:20: rang snang yin pas yul med pa'i dbang gis lhan
NK103(pe)008:21: skyes kyis gnas lugs rgyu ma rig kun brtag bdag
NK103(pe)008:22: tu ltas pas gzhan du snang ba'i cha las nyon
NK103(pe)008:23: mongs lnga dang rkyen las gsum gyis //
NK103(pe)008:24: yid sna tshogs su spros pa'i yul lnga sgo lngas
NK103(pe)008:25: 'bras bu mtshan mar nyon yid nga bdag tu bzung
NK103(pe)008:26: bas 'dzin pa'i sdug bsngal brgyad dang gsum gyis thar
NK103(pe)008:28: gtan tshigs kyis gzhig rtags la brten dpes mtsho na
NK103(pe)008:29: yid ches bka' las gdams pas mngon sum par sku
NK103(pe)008:30: gsum ro gcig tu rtogs pas 'dud //
NK103(pe)008:31: gnas lugs bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan thob pa'i
NK103(pe)008:32: gzhi rten du gyur pa lta bur rang nyid ye
NK103(pe)008:33: nas bsgyub bya'i don gyi gzhir gnas pas //
NK103(pe)008:34: la de dang 'khrul tshul mthun par rtogs pa'i rkyen
NK103(pe)008:35: bzhis bskal te de dang mi mthun pa'i rkyen dang
NK103(pe)008:36: ldan te phyin ci log tu goms pas ye nas
NK103(pe)008:37: don gyi gzhir gnas kyang bde gshegs kyi yon tan
NK103(pe)008:38: rdzogs pa sbas pa ltar du bral //
NK103(pe)008:39: lhan skyes rang ngo ma shes pa'i rgyu mun par
NK103(pe)008:40: ma zad kun brtags kyi ma rig pa dang nyon
NK103(pe)008:41: mongs pa dang des kun nas bslangs pa'i rkyen las
NK103(pe)008:42: kyis sdug bsngal thog mtha' med pas yun ring theg
NK103(pe)008:43: brgyad rtsol ba'i nad bzod pa dka' bar 'bras bu
NK103(pe)008:44: smin pa // de kun rang rkyen log pas grol
NK103(pe)008:45: dka' rdzogs chen gyi skal ldan 'ga' tsam 'byung ba'i
NK103(pe)008:46: phyir lung dang man ngag nyams tshad ma gsum dang
NK103(pe)008:47: ldan pa'i sa lam 0bstan par bya'o zhes gsung bar
NK103(pe)008:49: de 0yi ngo bo byang chub sems nyid ming don nges tshig dang //
NK103(pe)008:50: sbyang bgrod med pa'i srog dang ye nas non pa'i
NK103(pe)008:51: gdeng chen blo'i rim pas dbye ba rnams bstan bar
NK103(pe)008:52: bya // byang chub kyi sems nyid la gnas shing rten pa dang de //
NK103(pe)008:53: phyin par 'jug cing sa lam gyi ming don dang ldan pas //
NK103(pe)008:54: sa lam gyi ngo bo sems nyid du //
NK103(pe)008:55: phyin pas yon tan gyi gazhi'am rten du rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:56: lam 'bras yon tan mang po'i tshogs kyi gzhir rten du gyur cing //
NK103(pe)008:57: don de la blo 'jug cing rtogs pas mthar son //
NK103(pe)008:58: sems nyid ngang rtogs nas goms pas 'dris pa'i don de las //
NK103(pe)008:59: ming du sa dang lam zhes gsungs pa yin no //
NK103(pe)008:60: sgrib 0pa spangs nas yon tan la //
NK103(pe)008:61: ched du blang du med par mkhyen //
NK103(pe)008:63: rang gnas don la der son pa ni srog 'o //
NK103(pe)008:64: lhun gyis gnas pa'i bde ba che //
NK103(pe)008:65: gzhir gnas yon tan kun gyi rten //
NK103(pe)008:66: de la rtogs goms sems zhugs pas //
NK103(pe)008:67: mthar thug 'bras bu'i don de la ye nas rdzogs pas gdeng chen po dang ldan pa yin no //
NK103(pe)008:68: don la dbyer med tha dad dang bral ba yin pa las //
NK103(pe)008:69: gdul bya'i blo yi rim pas sa sbyong lam la 'jug pa'i thabs //
NK103(pe)008:70: ma bcos bla ma'i sar ye nas rdzogs la //
NK103(pe)008:71: ma bcos pas de bzhin nyid du 'jug cing ngang la gnas pa dang //
NK103(pe)008:72: sa sbyangs pa dang lam bgrod pa'i rtsol bas 'jug gnas rten //
NK103(pe)008:73: bsti gnas tsam du bstan pa yin //
NK103(pe)008:74: de yang bus pa'i sa pa ste //
NK103(pe)008:75: mos pa spyod pa'i sa pas drod thob nas //
NK103(pe)008:76: gzung ba'i rtog pa'i phyogs la rnam par byang bar
NK103(pe)008:77: byas nas chos kyi mig dang po rnyed pas dkar
NK103(pe)008:78: po rnam par mthong ba'i sa zhes bya //
NK103(pe)008:79: dad pa shin tu che ba'i sa pas 'jig rten gyi chos kyi mchog la //
NK103(pe)008:80: chos dang gang zag la bdag med pa'i bzod pas
NK103(pe)008:81: byang chub thob pa'i rigs dang ldan pas na rigs
NK103(pe)008:83: sa de nas byang chub rnam gsum gyi rigs 'byed ces kyang bshad do //
NK103(pe)008:84: dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pa'i gral dang po
NK103(pe)008:85: nas yas mar bgrangs na grangs brgyad pa la 'bab
NK103(pe)008:86: pas na brgyad pa'i sa zhes bya //
NK103(pe)008:87: rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rgyu la zhugs pa des na yin te //
NK103(pe)008:88: mthong lam skad cig bco lnga pa yan chad do //
NK103(pe)008:89: bcu drug pa rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas pas //
NK103(pe)008:90: bden pa bzhi'i de kho na nyid ma lus par
NK103(pe)008:91: brtags par mthong bas na mthong ba'i sa zhes bya
NK103(pe)008:92: // spang bya mthong spang mtha' dag dang sgom spang
NK103(pe)008:93: 'dod khams kyi dgu las lnga pa yan chad ci
NK103(pe)008:95: lan cig phyir 'ong bas 'dod pa yi //
NK103(pe)008:96: khams kyi sgom spang drug pa yan chad spangs nas
NK103(pe)008:97: 'dod chags srab mor byas pas bsrabs pa'i sa ste
NK103(pe)008:98: chung ba'i rnam pa lus so //
NK103(pe)008:99: phyir mi 'ong ba'i sa la gnas pas 'dod pa la //
NK103(pe)008:100: 'dun pa dang gnod sems spangs pas 'dod pa'i 'dod
NK103(pe)008:101: chags dang bral bas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa
NK103(pe)008:102: zhes bya ste chung ba'i rnam pa spangs so //
NK103(pe)008:103: dgra bcom pa'i sa grub par byas bsrung ba'i rang bzhin can yin pas sngar byas ste //
NK103(pe)008:104: grub pa'i don mi nyams par srung ba'i phyir byas
NK103(pe)008:105: pa srung ba'am byas pa rtogs pa'i sa zhes bya
NK103(pe)008:106: ste // dngos su na dgra bcom pa la bya
NK103(pe)008:107: de las lhag pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i
NK103(pe)008:108: phyir goms par byar med do //
NK103(pe)008:109: mthong ba'i sa yan chad bzhi la dbang po'i bye brag gis ci rigs pa der nyan thos la /
NK103(pe)008:110: brten nas rten 'brel gyi sgo nas chos nyid rtogs te 'bras bu rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pas /
NK103(pe)008:111: yid sbyin bde mchog ces bar bse ru dang ne tsho ltar gnas //
NK103(pe)008:112: sa de las gzhan sa lam ni 'phags pa'i bden
NK103(pe)008:113: pa bzhi ni ji ltar 'phags pa rnams kyis bden
NK103(pe)008:114: par gzigs pa bzhin du so so //
NK103(pe)008:115: skye bo phyin ci log dang bcas pas bzung bas
NK103(pe)008:116: bden par mi mthong ba las khyad par du 'phags
NK103(pe)008:118: zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed la yid du
NK103(pe)008:119: 'ong ba rnams ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dang yid
NK103(pe)008:120: du mi 'ong ba rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug
NK103(pe)008:121: bsngal bar 'gyur de las ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan
NK103(pe)008:122: ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bas sdug bsngal bar
NK103(pe)008:123: gyur pa ste // lnga phung sdug bsngal gsum po
NK103(pe)008:124: de dang ldan pas na sgro btags min pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)008:125: gyur pa ste // bden pa'o // 'du byed las
NK103(pe)008:126: gsum dang srid gsum du slar skye zhing 'byung bar
NK103(pe)008:127: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs de
NK103(pe)008:128: dag las sdug bsngal kun 'byung bas kun 'byung gi
NK103(pe)008:129: gyur pa ste // bden pa'o // bden pa //
NK103(pe)008:130: 'gog pa thob pas nyon mongs pa de dag kun
NK103(pe)008:131: bral ba'i phyir 'gog pa'i bden pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:132: 'gog pa der 'gro ba'am thob pa'am tshol ba mtshon pa'am dmigs par 'gyur bas na lam zhes bya //
NK103(pe)008:133: bde na pa bzhi po de las re re la
NK103(pe)008:134: bzhi bzhi lnga tshan gnyis dang drug tu dbye ste
NK103(pe)008:135: gang zhe na // rkyen la rag las pa'i phyir
NK103(pe)008:136: mi rtag pa ste rkyen gyis tshogs na ni skye
NK103(pe)008:137: bral na 'gag pa'am 'chi rang dbang med pas na
NK103(pe)008:139: sdug bsngal gsum dang brgyad kyis gnod pa'i bdag nyid yin pas sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK103(pe)008:140: bdag gir ltar ba'i mi mthun phyogs gnyen po yin te bdag med cing stong pas na stong pa //
NK103(pe)008:141: bdag tu lta ba'i gnyen po yin te lnga phung
NK103(pe)008:142: la mu stegs can gyis brtags pa'i srog dang sems
NK103(pe)008:143: can la sogs pa bdag tu bltar med cing stong
NK103(pe)008:144: pa nyid yin pas bdag med //
NK103(pe)008:145: lnga phung de 'i rgyu las dang nyon mongs pa
NK103(pe)008:146: ni phung po lnga'i rgyur gyur pas na rgyu 'bras
NK103(pe)008:148: rgyu de las 'bras bu rgyud drug khams gsum yang
NK103(pe)008:149: dag par 'byung ba'i tshul gyi kun 'byung ba ste
NK103(pe)008:151: bag chags sna tshogs brtas shing 'bras bu tha dad
NK103(pe)008:152: mngon par smin par byed pas rkyen te chu lud
NK103(pe)008:154: rgyu rkyen dang 'bras bu 'brel nas khams gsum du
NK103(pe)008:155: skye ba'i phyir rab tu skye ba ste me tog
NK103(pe)008:157: nye bar len pa'i phung po 'di dag ni 'dun pa'i rtsa ba can /
NK103(pe)008:160: 'dun pa las rab tu skye ba dag yin no //
NK103(pe)008:162: rab tu skye ba'i sgra tha mar bton pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
NK103(pe)008:164: rgyu rkyen kun 'byung spangs te bral bas phung po
NK103(pe)008:165: dang khams 'jig cing med par 'gyur ba'i phyir 'gog
NK103(pe)008:166: pa // sdug bsngal gyi me dug gsum mi 'byung
NK103(pe)008:167: zhing med par byas pa de zhi bar gnas pas
NK103(pe)008:168: pa // zhi ba // phyis kyang khams gsum gyi
NK103(pe)008:169: sdug bsngal bral te gnod pa med pas gya nom
NK103(pe)008:170: pa // zhi ba // pa // lam gyi bde
NK103(pe)008:171: bar phyin te skyon thams cad las grol bas nges
NK103(pe)008:172: pa // zhi ba // pa // par 'byung ba'o
NK103(pe)008:173: // 'phags pa'i lam mam sar zhugs nas mya ngan
NK103(pe)008:175: rigs pa dang ldan par bshad pas lam de 'khrul
NK103(pe)008:176: pa'i gnyen por gyur pas 'khrul pa med cing tshad
NK103(pe)008:177: mar gyur pas na rigs pa //
NK103(pe)008:178: phyin ci log rnams spangs nas yang dag thob par byed pa'i phyir bsgrub pa //
NK103(pe)008:179: slar 'khor bar mi skye bar shin tu 'das par yang dag par nges par 'byin pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:180: de la skad cig bcu drug gnas par phye ba
NK103(pe)008:181: re re la spang bya dmigs pa rnam pa lam
NK103(pe)008:182: de dag gang yin ngos zin par bya'o //
NK103(pe)008:183: sdug bsngal ba 0la de 0kho na nyid kyi yi chos //
NK103(pe)008:184: rtogs par bya bar bzod pas na shes rab kyi
NK103(pe)008:185: mig ste sdug bsngal la chos shes pa'i bzod pa
NK103(pe)008:186: zhes bya // chos shes pa'i bzod pa'i rjes la
NK103(pe)008:187: sdug bsngal gyi de kho na nyid rtogs par 'gyur
NK103(pe)008:188: zhes bya // bas na // sdug bsngal la chos shes pa zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)008:189: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal la chos shes pa la bzod pa de ltar du //
NK103(pe)008:190: khams gong ma gzugs dang gzugs med gnyis kyi chos
NK103(pe)008:191: shes pa la bzod pas na sdug bsngal la rjes
NK103(pe)008:192: su rtogs par shes pa'i bzod pa zhes bya //
NK103(pe)008:193: ji ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi phung po'i chos tsam du shes pa de ltar du //
NK103(pe)008:194: khams gong ma gnyis kyi phung po'ang chos tsam du
NK103(pe)008:195: rjes su rtogs par shes par byed pas na sdug
NK103(pe)008:196: bsngal la rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa //
NK103(pe)008:197: chos shes pa ni dang po 'dod pa'i khams la
NK103(pe)008:198: dmigs pa'i chos shes pa ste sa la lta ba
NK103(pe)008:199: dang 'dra // rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa ni
NK103(pe)008:200: khams gong ma gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba'i
NK103(pe)008:201: dang 'dra // gnyen po ste // gnam la yar lta ba dang 'dra bas /
NK103(pe)008:203: rjes su rtogs pa'i shes pa gnyis gcig gi yul gcig gis mi mthong ste //
NK103(pe)008:204: kun 'byung dang 'gog pa dang lam yang de bzhin du bshad pas //
NK103(pe)008:205: lam la rjes bzod yan chad skad cig ma lnga
NK103(pe)008:206: gsum bco lnga ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i rgyu la
NK103(pe)008:207: gnas pa'o // nyon mongs pas bar du gcod mi
NK103(pe)008:208: nus pas bar chad med pa zhes bya mrga na
NK103(pe)008:209: lam ste spyir na bsgom pa'i lam la gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)008:210: tshe bzod pa nyon mongs pa'i //
NK103(pe)008:211: gnyen por gyur pas nyon mongs pa chom rkun dang
NK103(pe)008:212: 'dra ba sgor phyung zhing spangs pa la bya bas
NK103(pe)008:213: na bar chad med pa'i lam zhes btags //
NK103(pe)008:214: tha ma rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:215: bsgom pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs bral ba yi //
NK103(pe)008:216: shes pa rkun po phyis mi 'byung bar sgo bcad
NK103(pe)008:217: pa bzhin pas rnam par grol ba'i lam zhes bya
NK103(pe)008:218: // mthong lam ste de kho na nyid thob ste de nyid rtogs rjes la //
NK103(pe)008:219: 'jig rten pa'i dge ba mang po 'phel zhing 'byung bas na //
NK103(pe)008:220: mngon rtogs mjug las 'byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba zhes bya'o //
NK103(pe)008:221: spyir khams gsum la sa dgu ste /
NK103(pe)008:225: sa dgu re re la spang bya che 'bring chung gsum dgu dgu yod de /
NK103(pe)008:226: de la 'dod khams na sgom lam gyi spang bya
NK103(pe)008:227: dgu las chen po la phye ba'i che 'bring chung
NK103(pe)008:228: gsum dang // 'bring gi chen po dang 'bring gi
NK103(pe)008:229: 'bring po ste lnga pa yan chad nas drug pa
NK103(pe)008:230: spangs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i rgyu la
NK103(pe)008:231: gsum dang // gnas pa'o // 'bring gi chung ngu
NK103(pe)008:232: ste drug pa spangs pa ni lan cig phyir 'ong
NK103(pe)008:234: chung ngu'i chen po dang chung ngu'i 'bring po ste
NK103(pe)008:235: brgyad pa spangs nas dgu pa spong ba ni phyir
NK103(pe)008:236: mi 'ong ba'i rgyu la gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:237: chung ngu'i chung ngu ste dgu pa spangs pa ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bur gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:239: srid rtse'i chung ngu'i 'bring po ste brgyad pa yan
NK103(pe)008:240: chad spangs nas dgu pa spong ba'i bar chad med
NK103(pe)008:241: pa ni dgra bcom pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:242: chung ngu'i chung ngu ste dgu pa rdo rje lta
NK103(pe)008:243: bus spangs pa'i rnam grol gyi lam ni dgra bcom
NK103(pe)008:245: mthong sgom gyi spang bya ni /
NK103(pe)008:247: srid pa'i rtsa ba phra rgyas drug /'dod chags de bzhin khong khro dang //
NK103(pe)008:248: nga rgyal ma rig lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)008:249: the tshom yin te de drug kyang //
NK103(pe)008:252: lta ba lnga ste 'jig tshogs dang //
NK103(pe)008:253: log dang mthar 'dzin lta ba dang //
NK103(pe)008:254: lta ba dang ni tshul khrims dang //
NK103(pe)008:255: brtul bzhugs mchog tu 'dzin dang bcu //
NK103(pe)008:256: de dag duhkha la bcu dang kun bdun 'gog bdun lam brgyad //
NK103(pe)008:257: lta ba gsum tshul khrims 'jig tshogs mthar 'dzin gnyis ma gtogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:258: 'dod na sdug bsngal la sogs pa //
NK103(pe)008:259: mthong bas rim bzhin spong bar byed //
NK103(pe)008:260: 'dod chags khong khro ma rig nga rgyal /
NK103(pe)008:261: bzhi ni sgom pa'i spang bya yin //
NK103(pe)008:262: so drug khong khro ma gtogs de dag nyid //
NK103(pe)008:263: gzugs khams na so gcig gzugs med de dang 'dra //
NK103(pe)008:264: ste so gcig de ltar dgu bcu brgyad du 'dod //
NK103(pe)008:266: rig dang zhabs su ldan pa yis //
NK103(pe)008:267: sbyin gnas gyur cing dge 'dun che //
NK103(pe)008:268: zhugs pa rnam pa bzhi dang ni //
NK103(pe)008:269: 'bras la gnas pa bzhi rnams so //
NK103(pe)008:270: zhes dbu ma tshigs gsal du mdo khungs drangs so //
NK103(pe)008:271: 'phags pa'i skyes bu zung bzhi la zhugs 'bras gnyis gnyis su phye bas gang zag yab brgyad do //
NK103(pe)008:272: theg pa nar son pas chen po rang gzhan gyi
NK103(pe)008:273: don du byang chub thob pa'i sems dang ldan pas
NK103(pe)008:274: // so so skye bo'i gnas skabs nas 'phags pa'i
NK103(pe)008:275: gnas su phyin par byed pas lam tshogs sbyor mthong
NK103(pe)008:276: sgom mthar lnga rim pas bsgom bya'i don gnas pa'i
NK103(pe)008:278: bsgom pa'i thabs kyi klong las der gsungs zin nas //
NK103(pe)008:279: 'di bcu la spyad cing bsgoms pas mthar phyin te
NK103(pe)008:280: phyi na ma lus pa na pha rol tu phyin
NK103(pe)008:281: pa bcu dang / sa gong ma'i yon tan thob
NK103(pe)008:282: pa'i rten du gyur cing sa de nyid yon tan
NK103(pe)008:283: gyi gzhi yin pas na sa bcur sbyar na //
NK103(pe)008:284: dam pa'i chos dang gdams ngag ston pa chos kyi
NK103(pe)008:285: sbyin pa dang lus dang longs spyod gtong bas zang
NK103(pe)008:286: zing gi rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa las
NK103(pe)008:288: yang na bdag dang gzhan gyi don du longs spyod
NK103(pe)008:289: btang zhing 1bu dang chung ma 'khor ma chags pas
NK103(pe)008:290: rab tu 'khor gsum du mi rtog pas lung srog
NK103(pe)008:292: sbyin pa de ltar rdzoogs par byas pas mngon 'dris par ma gyur pa'i don //
NK103(pe)008:293: chen po chos kyi dbyings mngon du mthong ba la
NK103(pe)008:294: rang don byang chub dang nye zhing gzhan don sems
NK103(pe)008:295: can mang po'i don dang gnyis 'grub par gzigs nas
NK103(pe)008:296: // mi dbul po rin po che'i gter dang phrad
NK103(pe)008:297: pa ltar du dga' ba rlangs po che skye bas
NK103(pe)008:299: sa gnyis par byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sgrub
NK103(pe)008:300: pas dge ba sdud pa dang sdom pa dang sems
NK103(pe)008:301: can thams cad la dbye bkol med bas don byed
NK103(pe)008:302: kyi tshul khrims dang gsum la gnas pas //
NK103(pe)008:303: mi dge bas 'khor bar sdig pa'i chos la dga' ba dang //
NK103(pe)008:304: snying rje med pas brtse bral dbus pa theg pa
NK103(pe)008:305: chung ngu la dga' bar gnas pa'i dri ma de
NK103(pe)008:306: gnyis med pas dri ma med yang na khrims rdzogs
NK103(pe)008:307: pas rmi lam na yang tshul khrims ngan pa'i las
NK103(pe)008:308: mi byed pas na dri ma med pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:309: sa gsum par dge ba sbyor dus su duh khas
NK103(pe)008:310: bar mi chod pas sdug bsngal 1gzhan gyis rdeg cing
NK103(pe)008:311: gnod pa byed kyang mi khro bas gnod byed 1stong
NK103(pe)008:312: pa bdag med zab mo'i don bstan na mi skrag
NK103(pe)008:313: cing dad pa dang dga' bas dam chos 11la /
NK103(pe)008:315: 111 / dang 1len dang ji 1mi snyam pa dang nges par bzod pa'i bzod pa gsum rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)008:316: bus pa nyan rang gi las grol ting 'dzin gyi
NK103(pe)008:317: phung po yongs su dag pa ye shes kyi 'od
NK103(pe)008:318: chen po'i gnas su gyur pa thob pas //
NK103(pe)008:319: lus srog la mi lta bar thos pa btsal bas
NK103(pe)008:320: bdag gzhan gyi mi shes pa'i mun pa bsal zhing
NK103(pe)008:321: ye shes skyed ba can 'od byed ba //
NK103(pe)008:322: sa bzhi par sems can gyi don sangs byang chub
NK103(pe)008:323: sgrub par dam bcas pa go cha dang thos bsam
NK103(pe)008:324: rgyun mi 'chad pa 'di dge ba bsdu ba rang
NK103(pe)008:325: bzhin sems can thabs kyis btul te dge ba la
NK103(pe)008:326: dgod pa'i don byed pa'i brtson 'grus gsum rdzogs pas
NK103(pe)008:327: // byang chub kyi phyogs bsgoms pas ye shes me
NK103(pe)008:328: dang 'dra ba skyes pa dang nyon mongs pa tsi
NK103(pe)008:329: sbur lta bu bsregs pa'i phyir 'pho ba can na
NK103(pe)008:330: // // sa lnga pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i
NK103(pe)008:331: ting nge 'dzin dang 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug dag ni
NK103(pe)008:332: mthong ba'i chos la bde ba gnas pa'i bsam gtan
NK103(pe)008:333: // // te // dpal bar 'gro ba la sogs
NK103(pe)008:334: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas kyi che ba
NK103(pe)008:335: thams cad 'thob par byed bas ni yon tan gyi
NK103(pe)008:336: chos mngon par bsgrubs pa dang /
NK103(pe)008:337: bsam gtan gyis mngon shes drug po dag thob nas
NK103(pe)008:338: rdzu 'phrul gyis sems can dga' bar byas shing gzhan
NK103(pe)008:339: gyi sems shes pas sems dang mthun par chos bshad
NK103(pe)008:340: nas mi dge ba las bzlog nas dge ba la
NK103(pe)008:341: 'god pa ni sems can gyi don byed pa'i bsam
NK103(pe)008:342: gtan gsum la gnas ba rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)008:343: bus pa nyan rang las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi bsgoms pas //
NK103(pe)008:344: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ting 'dzin las kyang mi nyams la //
NK103(pe)008:345: 'gro ba sems can gyi don byed pa yang rgyun
NK103(pe)008:346: mi gcod par spyod pa de gnyis mgo mnyam pas
NK103(pe)008:347: // 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis
NK103(pe)008:348: ka'i mtha' ru mi gnas pa'i shes rab yongs su
NK103(pe)008:349: dag par bya ba sbyang zhing sgom pa shin tu
NK103(pe)008:351: sa drug par nang rig pa gsung rab kyi don
NK103(pe)008:352: la mkhas pa ni bdag don dang gzhan gso ba
NK103(pe)008:353: dang bzo rig gnyis gzhan gyi don rtogs pa dang
NK103(pe)008:354: sgra tshad gnyis kyis mu stegs sun 'byin pa'i rgol
NK103(pe)008:355: ba tshar gcod pa'i shes rab gsum rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)008:356: 'khor 'das kyi mtha' gnyis ka la mi gnas shing
NK103(pe)008:357: mtshan ma med pa la ngang gis 'jug pa'i ye
NK103(pe)008:358: shes la mang du gnas shing //
NK103(pe)008:359: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba skye 'gag med pa'i
NK103(pe)008:360: don mngon du gzigs bas mngon du gyur pa'i sa'o
NK103(pe)008:361: // sa bdun par dge ba mang nyung ci byas
NK103(pe)008:362: kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
NK103(pe)008:363: shing bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por bsngosa
NK103(pe)008:364: pas de'i 'bras bu tshad med pa ste thabs de
NK103(pe)008:365: lta bu rdzogs pas 'bad pa dang //
NK103(pe)008:366: rtsol bas 'jug pa'i mtshan ma mthar phyin cing //
NK103(pe)008:367: ring du song la mtshan ma med pa la bgrod
NK103(pe)008:368: pa gcig tu gyur pa'i lam dang nye bas ring
NK103(pe)008:369: du song ba'o // sa brgyad pa ting nge 'dzin
NK103(pe)008:370: dang 'grogs pa'i shes rab kyi stobs kyis phyi nang
NK103(pe)008:371: gi chos rnams stong pa dang /
NK103(pe)008:372: bdag med par mthong bas de la chags pa mi
NK103(pe)008:373: skye ba ni kun tu brtags pa'i stobs dang brtson
NK103(pe)008:374: 'grus shas che bas shes rab chung yang goms pa'i
NK103(pe)008:375: shugs kyis dge ba'i phyogs 'bad mi dgos par sgrub
NK103(pe)008:376: pa ni bsgom stobs mi mthun pa'i phyogs ser sna
NK103(pe)008:377: la sogs pas mi tshugs pas na stobs so //
NK103(pe)008:379: mtshan ma'i 1mtshan ma med par rtsol ba yi1 //
NK103(pe)008:380: 'du 11shes gnyis ka zil gyis gnon cis kyang bskyod par mi nus pas mi g.yo ba'o //
NK103(pe)008:381: sa dgu par bdag tshe rabs gar skyes kyang byang
NK103(pe)008:382: chub kyi sems dang ma bral zhing sems can kun
NK103(pe)008:383: gyi don du pha rol phyin pa'i spyod pa rgyun
NK103(pe)008:384: mi gcod par gyur cig ces smon pas //
NK103(pe)008:385: chos 1don 1nges tshig 1spob pa 1so 11so 11yang dag par rig pa bzhi brnyes pas na //
NK103(pe)008:386: blo gros gzhan las 'phags pa yin te chos kyi
NK103(pe)008:387: mkhan por gyur pas legs pa'i kun mkhyen 'gyur bas
NK103(pe)008:389: sa bcu par chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid stong pa
NK103(pe)008:390: nyid thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa'i nang
NK103(pe)008:391: du chos kyi longs spyod chen pos longs cher spyod
NK103(pe)008:392: pa'i ye shes kyi phar phyin rdzogs pas //
NK103(pe)008:393: gzungs dang ting 'dzin kun la sprin ltar du khyab cing //
NK103(pe)008:394: de las char babs pas dgon gdung sbangs nas rtsi
NK103(pe)008:395: thog thams cad 'khrungs pa dang 'dra bar ye shes
NK103(pe)008:396: dang thugs rje sprin lta bus sems can rnams la
NK103(pe)008:397: chos kyi char babs pas dge ba'i myu gu lta
NK103(pe)008:399: chos kyi sprin gyi sa chen po zhes bya ste de dag rab tu rdzogs so //
NK103(pe)008:400: zhi gnas bkrol la bslang ste snying rje'i thag pas
NK103(pe)008:401: sdug bsngal can gyi 'gro ba rnams drang ba'i phyir
NK103(pe)008:402: // de la phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa rnams
NK103(pe)008:403: kyi zhal dang phyag gis yang na 'od zer chen
NK103(pe)008:404: po'i dbang dbang bskur sprul pa rgya chen po 'gyed
NK103(pe)008:406: zhi ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha' la mi
NK103(pe)008:407: gnas par nges par legs pa'i 'bras bu byang chub
NK103(pe)008:408: la gnas // pa la gang gis kyang bar chad
NK103(pe)008:409: mi nus pas bar chad med pa'i lam sgrib pa
NK103(pe)008:410: rtsa ba nas 'joms pas rdo rje lta bu yi
NK103(pe)008:411: la gnas // // ting nge 'dzin dri ma med pa mchog dam pa'i shes rab des //
NK103(pe)008:412: shes bya'i sgrib pa shin tu cha phra ba sangs rgyas kyi sgrib pa de //
NK103(pe)008:413: rgyun bcad nas mthar thug nges don ngang du gnas par 'dod pa yang //
NK103(pe)008:414: rten sku chos longs sprul gsum ye shes me long /
NK103(pe)008:417: sprul bzhi yi bdag nyid yin de //
NK103(pe)008:418: sku gsum yang chos sku mnyam bzhag la gzugs sku gnyis rjes thob kyi tshul du gnas pa'am //
NK103(pe)008:419: sangs rgyas ni chos sku mnyam bzhag 'ba' zhig tsam
NK103(pe)008:420: yin la gzugs sku gnyis po 'khor gdul bya dag
NK103(pe)008:421: ma dag gi ngo la snang bas sgro btags su
NK103(pe)008:422: 'dod pa dang // spros pa dang bral ba nyid
NK103(pe)008:423: tsam chos kyi sku yin la gzugs sku gnyis de
NK103(pe)008:424: 'dod pa dang // bzhin // kun rdzob tsam du
NK103(pe)008:425: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes gnas pa'ang 'khor
NK103(pe)008:427: 'od zer bkye bas 'dul ba'i sems can smin par
NK103(pe)008:428: mdzad cing chos kyi snang ba 'od dang 'dra bas
NK103(pe)008:429: thams cad gsal bar byas pas sangs rgyas kyi sa
NK103(pe)008:430: kun tu 'od kyi ces bya ste de'i sa ru
NK103(pe)008:432: don gyi gnas lugs la nges par brtags na gdul bya drang ba'i don tsam yin te //
NK103(pe)008:433: rang gi sa'i gnas skabs 'bras bu las mthar phyin pa nges pa'i don yin par bzhed do //
NK103(pe)008:434: bya ba'i rgyud dang gnyi ga'i rgyud dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud dang //
NK103(pe)008:435: rnal 'byor chen po dang rjes su rnal 'byor rnams kyi sa lam ni //
NK103(pe)008:436: bsgom thabs kyi klong du bstan pa ji bzhin du
NK103(pe)008:437: gnas skabs lam gyi sa lam rnams shes par bya
NK103(pe)008:438: ste // sngags phyi nang rang rang gi mthar thug
NK103(pe)008:439: 'bras bu nges pa'i don yin par 'dod sa lam
NK103(pe)008:440: ste // ni // 'bras bu'i klong du slob dpon nyid kyis sbyar ba ji bzhin no //
NK103(pe)008:441: ma bcos gong na med pas bla ma ye nas gnas pa la yon tan rdzogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)008:442: sa dang lam zhes su gsungs pa yang //
NK103(pe)008:443: ji bzhin pa nyid du gnas shing rten pas byang chub kyi sems //
NK103(pe)008:444: don la 'jug cing mthar phyin par byed pas ye shes lam //
NK103(pe)008:445: a ti'i skal ba dang ldan pa snod kyi yon tan rdzogs pa rtogs grol chig chod dang //
NK103(pe)008:446: a ti'i skal ba dang ldan pa blo zhan te
NK103(pe)008:447: tshig chod min na rtogs pa la gnas pa'i sa'i
NK103(pe)008:449: res 'ga' ba ste gnas pa'i nyams dang gnyis pa mi g.yo bar gnas pa'i //
NK103(pe)008:450: gsum pa 'khor 'das mnyam par mkhyen pa'i nyams kyis lam mthar phyin par byed //
NK103(pe)008:451: bzhi pa lam gyi 'bad rtsol dang bral ba bde
NK103(pe)008:452: ba chen por gnas pa ste ye shes lhun gyis
NK103(pe)008:454: nyams bzhi po de dag don la dbye ba byar
NK103(pe)008:455: med pa las rtogs pa goms pas brtan pa'i thabs
NK103(pe)008:456: // don gyi nyams rim bzhi skye ba'i rim pas nges par mtshon nas drang ba'i lung yin par //
NK103(pe)008:457: mthong ba sna tshogs zhes drangs rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid kyis gsang ba'i le'u lnga par gsungs //
NK103(pe)008:458: shan 'byed bram ze'i rgyud la bzlas rgyal po'i don
NK103(pe)008:459: la mngon sum du gnas par byed pa'i man ngag
NK103(pe)008:460: gi rgyud de tshig lam las //
NK103(pe)008:461: goms byed cha rkyen lam dang sa zhes grags pa gzhung gsal rgya che yang //
NK103(pe)008:462: ha cang spros pas thos chung rnyed dka' thos mang bsdus par dka' bar mthong bas //
NK103(pe)008:463: sku gsum lung la brten te cung zad ngas gsal
NK103(pe)008:464: bar mthong ba'i don de bram ze snying po grub
NK103(pe)008:465: // pa khyod la gzhag par bkod pas 'di yis khyod kyi sa lam the tshom chod par gyis //
NK103(pe)008:466: khyod rang dang 'dra ba'i rnal 'byor pa mthar thug
NK103(pe)008:467: gi skal ldan rnams la dga' rab nga yi phrin
NK103(pe)008:468: yig kye zhes bos nas 'di rim par gtod cig
NK103(pe)008:469: / bdag dang sangs rgyas kyi skal ba yod par 'gro ba kun mnyam yang //
NK103(pe)008:470: sems nyid lhag par bskyangs pas dga' rab bdag byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub thob //
NK103(pe)008:471: de ltar skal ba mnyam pa la skal ba chad pa lta bu'i 'gro ba rnams //
NK103(pe)008:472: sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag gyur par mthong nas sa lam gyi rnam pa rim par sbyangs te //
NK103(pe)008:473: ston pa'i bstan pa theg pa'i rim pa bzhin du sa dang lam gyis drangs pa ni //
NK103(pe)008:474: 'gro ba'i rigs dang mos pas rnam par phye ste bus pa brid par bstan pa yin //
NK103(pe)008:475: blo gros mchog ldan tshig rjes ma 'brang nges par gnas pa'i don la yid ches gyis //
NK103(pe)008:476: kho bos sgra phyir ma phyin don la gnas pas yang dag sa la btsal med gshegs //
NK103(pe)008:477: byang chub kyi sems de kho na nyid nges pa'i sa lam bstan pa //
NK103(pe)008:478: slob dpon dga' rab rdo rjes mdzad pa /
NK103(pe)008:479: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha b+ha ta dang /
NK103(pe)008:480: bod kyi lo ts+aa ba dge slong bee ro tsa
NK103(pe)008:481: nas yul d+ha he na'i 'du khang du zhus shing
NK103(pe)008:482: bsgyur te gtan la phab pa'o //
NK103(pe)008:486: slob dpon 'jam dpal brtan pa dang /
NK103(pe)008:487: rong zom chos kyi bzang po'i gzhung rnams dang legs
NK103(pe)008:488: par bstun nas theg pa che chung gi sa dang
